Contact Us
==========

Have any questions or issues?
-----------------------------

501 Miller Street
  
P O Box 578
  
Anahuac, Texas 77514

Monday - Friday:
  
7:00a.m. - 4:00p.m.

[409-267-6681](tel:409-267-6681)

AFTER HOURS EMERGENCY

Call [409-277-9250](tel:409-277-9250)

##### Tax Information

This budget will raise more revenue from property taxes than last year’s budget by an amount of $6,838.00, which is a .0096 increase from last year’s budget. The property tax revenue to be raised from new property added to the tax roll this year is $70,742.

[Current Budget](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1bxZY42TYBW7er47SSE1rylSvCbh-kQHB/view?usp=drive_link)
[Water quality report](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1jjSijeCLniTNAVQFnMpTiiYEKc197zj8/view?usp=drive_link)
